name: Calculus I
description: Here, we learn the basics of calculus, complex numbers and equations, and sequences.

name: Programming I
description: The programming language C as well as the basics of programming as a concept. Introducing if and for loops, functions and files.

name: Calculus II
description: We delve deeper into calculus, where the true pain starts and you start overdosing on coffee.

name: Programming II
description: A peak into Java and OOP (Object Oriented Programming). If you don't like it, you have no taste.

name: Databases
description: MySQL, Databases, Rows, Columns, Tables, Chairs and how to use of phpMyAdmin

name: Calculus III
description: As if Calculus II wasn't enough, get ready for triple integrals and a million ways to solve differential equations.

name: Data Structures
description: Delve deeper into C, learning about Loops, Trees, Graphs, Sequences.

name: Computer Architecture
description: If you thought calculus was hard, by the end of this semester you would have preferred more.

name: Compilers
description: Oh, so you know C? Make a compiler for it. You have one semester to learn it and a lifetime to regret your career path.

name: Game Development
description: Unreal Engine 4, Blender, and a lot of YouTube tutorials
